message_text: There is a leak on the North side of town that is flooding the street.
Please document the emergency I fixed for future reference.
I need help calming a debate in the lobby.
Please respond to my emails. We need to talk about future plans.
Hannibal, Rena, Barney, I need to communicate with you three if we are to succeed. Reply back if you read this.
Does anyone know what we are supposed to do?
Hal, you have to save the people's data, then tell us what happens.
